title: WE WANT NORMAL DRAFT PICK
body:
We want normal draft pick on oce, i am pretty everyone has just got on after a day or two of not playing a league game and itching to play the lane they main, and its sometimes a struggle to get by fighting with a stranger to get a lane, most of the time when this happens to me i just dodge, Riot has been saying oce is to small for a draft pick, which is bs i get into a game with 2 minutes during week-days i do not care if i have to wait 5 minutes and i am pretty sure most of us can agree on this one, those of us who have played or experienced draft pick in other regions like me can tell you its much better then blind pick, it adds a bit of formality.


Please add draft pick
